metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14196 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In PowerDNS Recursor versions up to and including 4.3.1, 4.2.2 and 4.1.16, the ACL restricting access to the internal web server is not properly enforced.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-14196` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdns-recursor - 4.3.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1').
